resources.string: Create a new group for your trip. Enter your group\'s name, destination, description etc
Once the group is created start adding members in it. Minimum number of members allowed is 2 and maximum number is 15
You can add \'To-Do\' for each member
Add the details of expenses every time someone pays. Select who paid and for whom, how much, for what reason, at what time etc
If someone pays back the amount he owes to someone, you need to add it here
All the transactions that were made in the trip will be shown here with all the details
This section will tell you how to settle the debts among the members
